name: Leporia
tagline: Evaluate your financial portfolio based on your personal goals in a simple and visual way.
description: Leporia is a web tool that helps you analyze and evaluate your investment portfolio based on your personal financial goals. Define your goals, enter your portfolio, and get a clear view of your financial situation.

meta.metaDescription: Leporia - Evaluate your financial portfolio based on your personal goals. Developed by BigotiTech.
